channel.title: Comments on: What the? Where Did All This Extra Gold Come From?

item.title: By: Aufero
item.dc:creator: Aufero
item.description:
Meh. The temptation is always there, but so is the knowledge that the economy I'd be screwing up (okay, screwing up more) is the one I have to deal with if I keep playing.
And honestly, as much as I've been laughed at for saying it in other situations, cheating just takes the fun out of the game. When I start using cheat codes and hacks, it's a pretty good sign I won't be playing that game much longer.
item.content:encoded:
Meh. The temptation is always there, but so is the knowledge that the economy I’d be screwing up (okay, screwing up more) is the one I have to deal with if I keep playing.

And honestly, as much as I’ve been laughed at for saying it in other situations, cheating just takes the fun out of the game. When I start using cheat codes and hacks, it’s a pretty good sign I won’t be playing that game much longer.

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: i say do, so that the ones that do it get caught, and i don't have to play with them anymore 8)
item.content:encoded: i say do, so that the ones that do it get caught, and i don’t have to play with them anymore 8)

item.title: By: Dominik Gabler
item.dc:creator: Dominik Gabler
item.description:
considering i worked nearly 3 months to get my epic mount and still have not finished the temptation to "do" was rather high, but i have some years ago promised myself never to exploit anything knowingly (sp?) and so far i have done that.
It's funny though that absolutly everyone and their monkey knows about this today, i know blizzard stationed GMs at some instance entrances to watch this behaviour and i know of at least 15 people who go banned on my own server in the last 2 days for duping, so at least they are trying to react.
item.content:encoded:
considering i worked nearly 3 months to get my epic mount and still have not finished the temptation to “do” was rather high, but i have some years ago promised myself never to exploit anything knowingly (sp?) and so far i have done that.

It’s funny though that absolutly everyone and their monkey knows about this today, i know blizzard stationed GMs at some instance entrances to watch this behaviour and i know of at least 15 people who go banned on my own server in the last 2 days for duping, so at least they are trying to react.

item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.description:
I say do. After all, all this inflation can only weaken the market for gold farmers. If China is going to manipulate their currency to screw over the U.S. economy, why not manipulate WoW currency to screw over THEIR economy, BWAHAHAHA!!!!!
...
What?
item.content:encoded:
I say do. After all, all this inflation can only weaken the market for gold farmers. If China is going to manipulate their currency to screw over the U.S. economy, why not manipulate WoW currency to screw over THEIR economy, BWAHAHAHA!!!!!

…

What?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I know your adage "exploit early and often" was partially in jest, but duping (above all other exploits) affects every one of us.
If the question was a simple as "is it right or is it wrong", we know the answer to that. It's not that simple, however, and those who don't exploit pay a huge price, for many months to come.
item.content:encoded:
I know your adage “exploit early and often” was partially in jest, but duping (above all other exploits) affects every one of us.

If the question was a simple as “is it right or is it wrong”, we know the answer to that. It’s not that simple, however, and those who don’t exploit pay a huge price, for many months to come.

item.title: By: Troggdor
item.dc:creator: Troggdor
item.description: Using the old way Raids and quests USED to work. The new motto of warcraft is "Exploit early and exploit OFTEN". Although dont be a dumb arse and use the dupe bug on your main acount, get a dummy one :)
